title: (x) Taco John's - Belwe (customized) {Kyle (self)}
content:
I'm having trouble figuring out what this is...   
 ![MEXICAN.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524123357im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/3032.gif)   
It's _really_ close to Belwe...but the "W"   
keeps throwing me off:   
 ![W.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524123357im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/3033.gif)   
Is this an actual font or a custom thing?   
(This is from the tagline of the Taco John's   
logo, BTW.)
author: flow14

comments.content: Perhaps the designer used Belwe but redrew the ['W'](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524123357/http:/www.myfonts.com/Character?id=0057&vid=67607&charset=CP4&charpage=). A big improvement.

i was a bit thrown off because it was so rounded... but i guess you enlarged it from   
 [http://www.tacojohns.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524123357/http:/www.tacojohns.com/) ?   
the E is bit different in the top. weird.   
it must be Belwe, and like Scoles said, the W is fixed up. and if you look closely at tacojohns.com, the white space to the right in the W is too big... which implies that they simply removed the little flag thing and put a serif there.
